title: Grandmother who thought she was going to die among angry tourists stranded in Rhodes
description: On the floor of Rhodes airport, the exhausted sleep.

title: Flights to get hundreds of Britons out of Rhodes amid new fire alerts on Corfu
description: Flights have been arranged to get hundreds of Britons out of Rhodes, as thousands continue to flee wildfires on the Greek island - and new evacuations were announced on Corfu.

title: Sea evacuations begin in Corfu as wildfires chaos hit second Greek island
description: Sea evacuations have begun from a beach in Corfu to transport individuals fleeing wildfires on the Greek island - as scores of Britons await repatriation flights out of Rhodes.

title: Spain election: Exit polls suggest far-right Vox could help Popular Party take power
description: The right-wing Popular Party (PP) is projected to be ahead after a general election in Spain - but it is likely to need the support of the far-right to govern.

title: 'Planet-friendly' diet could reduce your risk of death - study
description: "Planet-friendly" foods may also help reduce a person's risk of death from cancer, heart disease and other chronic illnesses by 25%, researchers have said.

title: Musk hints he is about to replace Twitter's bird logo as part of 'super app' plan
description: Elon Musk says he could replace Twitter's blue bird logo by Monday - as he pushes ahead with plans to rebrand the social network as X.

title: 'I didn't realise I'd lost my leg': Risks taken by Ukrainian soldiers to defuse mines and booby traps
description: For the members of the demining unit in Ukraine's 35th marine brigade, every step is fraught with peril - every action is beset with risk - during a period that has been particularly dangerous.

title: Your guide to the when, why, who and what of the Spanish election
description: Spanish voters have gone to the polls in a general election that could see the return of a far-right party to the heart of power for the first time in half a century following the dictatorship of General Francisco Franco.

title: British family spend night on school floor after Rhodes wildfire evacuation order
description: A British family spent a night sleeping on the floor of a school after being evacuated from a wildfire on the Greek island of Rhodes.

title: What rights do holidaymakers have as Rhodes wildfires force thousands to flee hotels?
description: Raging wildfires on the Greek island of Rhodes have sparked the evacuation of around 2,000 tourists from its resorts.

title: The 1975 cancels Indonesia, Taiwan shows after Malaysia LGBT controversy
description: The 1975 has said it has cancelled shows in Taiwan and Indonesia - a day after Malaysia banned it from performing there after its frontman kissed a male bandmate on stage and criticised the country's anti-LGBT laws.

title: Trying to escape Rhodes wildfires 'was literally like the end of the world', says UK tourist
description: Escaping the wildfires in Rhodes felt like "the end of the world", a British tourist has told Sky News.
